body:
Comment 3: 
Can you run the program under gdb and then
when it gets a SIGILL, run the gdb command:

x/10i $pc

to dump the next 10 instructions in the
instruction stream?

I can easily believe that the arm compiler
is using some post-ARM5 instruction but it's
hard to tell what since I don't have any 
only-ARM5 hardware.

Thanks.

Thanks.
Russ
